products.title: essential loopback terry hoodie
products.description: We're layering. We're lounging. We're living in this one. The Essential Hoodie is a classic on all counts, with an upgraded fabric that'll have you ditching your old college hoodie in a heartbeat Lightweight cotton fleece Hoodie with crossover at neckline Raglan long sleeves Kangaroo pocket Make it a set with a pair of our Essential Loopback Terry Sweatpants

products.title: stretch rib crop long sleeve top
products.description: A deliciously textured top made for lounging, walking, or whatever else you may be doing. Pro tip: wear it as a set with our Stretch Rib Bootcut Legging and let the compliments roll in Stretchy, ribbed organic cotton fabric Wide neck, long sleeves Slim fit, cropped just below the ribcage Make it a set with our Stretch Rib Leggings

products.title: airplane mock neck pullover
products.description: Made with our bestselling fabric in a relaxed poncho style, the Airplane Mock Neck is perfect for sporting on-the-go or stashing in your carry-on. Bon voyage, babes! Double-knit fabric that's as soft as it is strong Short dolman sleeve, perfect for layering Ribbed mock neck and bottom hem Make it a set with the Airplane Pants

products.title: seaside linen blend simple crew
products.description: A timeless closet staple, now in our seasonal cotton/linen blend. Layer it, tuck it, keep it classic - there are no wrong answers Light, breathable organic cotton + linen blend Ribbed crew neck, short sleeves Side seam vents

products.title: classic fine knit crew sweater
products.description: Love that lasts. We made our classic sweater collection with 100% organic cotton, so you don't have to worry about pilling, stretching, or stuffy fabrics. Nothing better than a sweater that stands the test of time and trends Lightweight, organic cotton fine sweater knit Pintuck back seam detail Hits at the hip Wide ribbed collar

products.title: boulevard brushed twill long sleeve button up
products.description: Polished and comfortable with hidden pockets, this button-up is the kind of style that looks just as good on its own as it does layered over a tee Soft, light woven twill with a touch of stretch Collared neck, full button front with metal buttons On-seam hidden pockets at the base. Side panels. Button cuffs for easy rolling. Relaxed fit for easy layering

products.title: fireside flannel button up shirt
products.description: Just like your old favorite, the Fireside Flannel Button Up feels worn-in, wears well, and never goes out of style. But unlike your old favorite, this one's made with 100% organic cotton. Soft, organic cotton flannel. One front pocket. Collared button-down, long sleeves. Standard fit, great for layering

products.title: thermal waffle crew neck
products.description: Just as fluffy, buttery, and sweet, our Waffle Crew Neck is the perfect lounge piece to wear in or out of the house. Pair it with our Thermal Waffle Joggers for a balanced breakfast. Soft, thermal waffle fabric. Crew neck, long sleeves. Standard fit, straight cut

products.title: airplane long sleeve crew
products.description: For travel or leisure alike, the Airplane Crew is soft, comfortable, and perfect for pretending you book business class every time. Double-knit fabric that's as soft as it is strong. Crew neck, Raglan long sleeves. Ribbed trim .Make it a set with the Airplane Travel Pant. Relaxed fit for easy layering

products.title: the mix long sleeve crew
products.description: A touch of 90s nostalgia, with subtle texture and timeless style. We love rocking the Mix Long Sleeve at happy hours, concerts, and all casual hangs in between. Super soft melange jersey. Ribbed crewneck. Long sleeves. Straight hem. Standard fit, hits at the hip on most
